metadata.title: CVE-2022-0436 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - high
metadata.description:
Path Traversal in GitHub repository gruntjs/grunt prior to 1.5.2.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0436` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

grunt - 1.0.4-2ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: grunt package in esm-apps/focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.4-2ubuntu0.1~esm1').
